name: Fens of Nathsar
description: From the shores of the Lake of Ill Omen, to the dangerous wilds of the Swamp of No Hope, to the haunting echoes heard within the Field of Bone, the Fens of Nathsar can prove to be a beautiful and deadly place to any who choose to explore here. The scheming Dominus Rile makes his home here within the town of Rillis, as his armies campaign against the mighty sarnak found within Bathezid's Watch.
